channel.title: Proofzezima is very very fat with a beard
channel.description:
Lol this was form one of his vids
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/zjfbkg.jpg[/img]
if that aint clear go here
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ev6UaJwfWyM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ev6UaJwfWyM[/url]
pause at 1:35 or skip pause 1:32-1:35 [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 05:03:29 PM[/size][hr]Enjoy

item.title: Proofzezima is very very fat with a beard
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Cowie`:

Why is it that when someone plays a game, and they get to be one of / the best on the game, faggots look for oppertunities at every given moment to try to bash them ?

Jealousy.

Read full topic
